alert.note: Alert for Barton; Russell (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued April 19 at 10:21PM CDT until April 20 at 3:00AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM CDT THURSDAY... ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 7 AM CDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Advisory, east to northeast winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. For the High Wind Warning, north to northwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected behind a cold front. * WHERE...Russell and Barton Counties. * WHEN...For the High Wind Warning, from 3 AM to 7 AM CDT Thursday. For the Wind Advisory, until 3 AM CDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Power outages are possible. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.
